name: Careful Sneak
text: By taking your time, you negate penalties while sneaking in most armor.
benefit: You do not apply the armor check penalty for light and medium armor on Stealth skill checks as long as you move half your speed or less. You still cannot run or charge while using Stealth in this way.
text_zh: 通过投入更多的时间，你能够避免大多数护甲对潜行带来的妨害。
benefit_zh: 只要你的移动速度不超过自身速度的一半，便可以忽略轻甲和中甲对潜行检定带来的护甲检定减值（armor check penalty）。在以此方式潜行时，你仍旧无法奔跑（run）或冲锋（charge）。
